iem.title: [COLOR skyblue]A D R Y A N L I S T [/COLOR]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Seleciona una Lista ', ['AdryanList', 'ExabyteTV', 'TecnoTV', 'G67', 'Sr.RegioTV', 'PremierTV', 'GSat Latino', 'ChileIPTV']) lists = ['http://adryanlist.org/adryan/tecno.m3u', 'http://exabytetv.info/lista.m3u', 'http://tecnotv.xyz/lista.m3u', 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/G67/G/master/G67C.m3u', 'http://srregio.net/regiotv.m3u', 'http://www.premieriptv.cl/freeiptv.m3u', 'http://www.geantsat.com/freeiptv/s9.m3u', 'http://chileiptv.cl/cl.m3u'] return lists[ret]
